title: on me by sections 8 and 10(1)(b) of the Roads Act 1993 (No. 14 of 1993) and
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Roads Act 1993 (Classification of
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Roads Act 1993 (Classification of 

Regional Roads) (Amendment) Order 2022.
text_norm: 1 order may cited road act 1993 (classification regional roads) (amendment) order 2022

title: on me by sections 8 and 10(1)(b) of the Roads Act 1993 (No. 14 of 1993) and
heading: 2. The Roads Act 1993 (Classification of Regional Roads) Order 2012
text_raw:
2. The Roads Act 1993 (Classification of Regional Roads) Order 2012 
(S.I. No. 54 of 2012) is amended in the Schedule by the substitution of the 
following for the matter in column (2) opposite the mention of the regional 
road R444 in column (1): 

“Shannonbridge - Clonmacnoise, County Offaly - Boyanagh, County 
Westmeath 

Between its junction with R357 at Shannonbridge in the county of Offaly and 
its junction with R446 at Boyanagh in the county of Westmeath via Cloniff, 
Creevagh, Clonmacnoise, Clonfinlough, Mannion’s Cross, Doon Cross and 
Esker in the county of Offaly: Clonmore and Kilcleagh in the county of 
Westmeath.”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal 
2 September, 2022. 

EAMON RYAN, 

Minister for Transport. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 9th September 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [437] 3

title: on me by sections 8 and 10(1)(b) of the Roads Act 1993 (No. 14 of 1993) and
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

This order amends the Schedule of the Roads Act 1993 (Classification of 
Regional Roads) Order 2012 (S.I. No. 54 of 2012) to address road 
classification issues regarding the R444 in County Westmeath. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [437]
